data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro Anniversary Edition, Latest Discord Canary
data.actual_result: WoW Overrides the control and thinks your moving the map/In Game World
data.short_description: Overlay wont open on WoW. RE: Bug Bounty - https://trello.com/c/Kq79lMZG/193-user-cannot-open-overlay-with-wow-and-overwatch
data.steps_to_repro: - Open WoW with Overlay Enabled (Appears Without a Doubt) - Click on Overlay wont work so open the overlay with a keybinding (in this case Shift + ') - Close the Overlay with the Discord Icon as Normal - Try Clicking on it again (now it wont open)
